synchronization". The command fails with a dialog box and the error below.

The active synchronization was CVS (Workspace), pinned.

fixed the NPE, but there are a couple of problems with key bindings still.
Keeping open editor key bindings can be fixed.

Since the remaining issues with keybindings are not mentioned here, I'm 
closing this bug.
